snippet: The museum, which was scheduled to open to the public in Modena, Italy, on Saturday, was designed by the Czech architect Jan Kaplicky, who died in 2009.
abstract: The museum, which was scheduled to open to the public in Modena, Italy, on Saturday, was designed by the Czech architect Jan Kaplicky, who died in 2009.

headline.main: At the Enzo Ferrari Museum, Housing 2 Legacies
